text: Sometime later, during the wheat harvest, Samson took a young goat as a gift and went to visit his bride. He said to her father, “I want to sleep with my bride in her bedroom!” But her father would not let him enter.

Her <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="0559" class="">really</st> <st data-num="0559 03588">thought</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="08130" class="">absolutely</st> <st data-num="08130" class="">despised</st><n id="2" /> her, so I <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> her to your <st data-num="04828" class="">best man</st>. Her <st data-num="06996" class="">younger</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">is</st> more <st data-num="02896" class="">attractive</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> she is. <st data-num="01961 04994">Take</st> her <st data-num="08478" class="">instead</st>!”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to them,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="06471" class="">This time</st> I <st data-num="05352" class="">am justified</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">in</st> <st data-num="06213 0589 05973">doing</st> the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">harm</st>!”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="03920" class="">captured</st> <st data-num="07969 03967" class="">300</st> <st data-num="07776" class="">jackals</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03947" class="">got</st> some <st data-num="03940" class="">torches</st>. He <st data-num="06437" class="">tied</st> the jackals <st data-num="02180 0413 02180">in pairs by their tails</st> and then <st data-num="07760 08432">tied</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">a</st> <st data-num="03940" class="">torch</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">to</st> <st data-num="08147 02180">each pair</st>.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="01197 0784">lit</st> the <st data-num="03940" class="">torches</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07971" class="">set</st> the jackals <st data-num="07971" class="">loose</st> in the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines’</st> <st data-num="07054" class="">standing grain</st>. He <st data-num="01197" class="">burned up</st> the <st data-num="01430" class="">grain heaps</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="07054" class="">standing grain</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">as well as</st> the <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyards</st> and <st data-num="02132" class="">olive groves</st>.

The <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st>?” They were <st data-num="0559" class="">told</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st>, the <st data-num="08554" class="">Timnite’s</st> <st data-num="02860" class="">son-in-law</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the Timnite<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> Samson’s<n id="4" /> <st data-num="0802" class="">bride</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> her to his <st data-num="04828" class="">best man</st>.” So the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> and <st data-num="08313 0784">burned</st> her and her <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to them, “<st data-num="0518" class="">Because</st> you <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="03588 0518">will</st> <st data-num="05358" class="">get revenge</st> against you <st data-num="0310" class="">before</st> I <st data-num="02308" class="">quit</st> fighting.”<n id="2" />
He struck them down and defeated them. Then he went down and lived for a time in the cave in the cliff of Etam.
The Philistines went up and invaded Judah. They arrayed themselves for battle in Lehi.

The <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">Why</st> are you <st data-num="05927 05921">attacking</st><n id="1" /> us?” The Philistines<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “We have <st data-num="05927" class="">come up</st> to <st data-num="0631" class="">take</st> <st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="0631" class="">prisoner</st> so we can <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> to him <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> he has <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> to us.”

So <st data-num="07969 0505" class="">3,000</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> <st data-num="03381" class="">went down</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05585" class="">cave</st> in the <st data-num="05553" class="">cliff</st> of <st data-num="05862" class="">Etam</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st>, “Do you <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="04910" class="">rule</st> over us? <st data-num="04100" class="">Why</st> have you <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> to us?” He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to them, “I have <st data-num="03651" class="">only</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> to them <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> they have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> to me.”

They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “We have <st data-num="03381" class="">come down</st> to <st data-num="0631" class="">take</st> you <st data-num="0631" class="">prisoner</st> so we can <st data-num="05414" class="">hand</st> you <st data-num="03027" class="">over</st> to the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st>.” <st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to them, “<st data-num="07650" class="">Promise</st> me<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="06435" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06293" class="">kill</st><n id="2" /> me.”

They <st data-num="0559 0559">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="03808" class="">We promise</st>!<n id="1" /> We will <st data-num="03588" class="">only</st> <st data-num="0631" class="">take</st> you <st data-num="0631" class="">prisoner</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">hand</st> you <st data-num="03027" class="">over</st> to them. We <st data-num="04191" class="">promise</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> you.” They <st data-num="0631" class="">tied</st> him <st data-num="0631" class="">up</st> with <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02319" class="">brand new</st> <st data-num="05688" class="">ropes</st> and <st data-num="05927" class="">led</st> him <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05553" class="">cliff</st>.

When he arrived in Lehi, the Philistines shouted as they approached him. But the Lord’s Spirit empowered him. The ropes around his arms were like flax dissolving in fire, and they melted away from his hands.

He <st data-num="04672" class="">happened to see</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="02961" class="">solid</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03895" class="">jawbone</st> of a <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st>. He <st data-num="07971 03027 03947">grabbed</st> it<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="05221" class="">struck down</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="0505" class="">1,000</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>.

Samson then said,

“With the jawbone of a donkey

I have left them in heaps;

with the jawbone of a donkey

I have struck down a thousand men!”
When he finished speaking, he threw the jawbone down and named that place Ramath Lehi.
He was very thirsty, so he cried out to the Lord and said, “You have given your servant this great victory. But now must I die of thirst and fall into the hands of these uncircumcised Philistines?”

So <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01234" class="">split open</st> the <st data-num="04388 0834">basin</st><n id="1" /> at <st data-num="03895" class="">Lehi</st>, and <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">flowed out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it. When he <st data-num="08354" class="">took a drink</st>, his <st data-num="07307" class="">strength</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="07725" class="">restored</st> and he <st data-num="02421" class="">revived</st>. <st data-num="05921" class="">For</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">this reason</st> he <st data-num="07121 08034">named</st> the spring<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05875" class="">En Hakkore</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">It</st> remains in <st data-num="03896" class="">Lehi</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.
Samson led Israel for 20 years during the days of Philistine prominence.
